external_games.name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2 Additional Content Pack 2

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2: Sister's Generation - Additional Content Pack 2
summary:
This DLC will add the following items:
・Change Dungeon: Endless Zone
・Plan: Nurse Badge
・Plan: Tome of Darkness

It will also add the following content:
・Increase level cap by 300
・A new Colosseum battle is available
